response.overview: Red Wine and Sugar worked sporadically on this short film since 2016. Samaan filmed on 16mm, then edited the processed and scanned film. Mark wrote the text, and read it aloud. The demarcation of roles wasn’t so clear cut throughout the process, because you can hear Samaan and see Mark at points, but generally, that’s how it went.
response.title: Twenty Grams of Protein
